title: Heist! The 17 Million Loomis Fargo Theft
description: In 1997, an amateurish group of thieves pulled off the second-largest cash heist in America's history. Diamant uses his inside knowledge as lead reporter on the story for the Charlotte Observer to fill in all the hilarious details of a story that has been featured on ABC's 20/20, America's Most Wanted, America's Dumbest Criminals, and Discovery Channel's The Unperfect Crime.
author: Jeff Diamant
